channel.title: Blogs on Isagani Jaen
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Isagani Jaen

item.title: Meet ProdAI: My Open-Source AI Assistant
item.description: Hey everyone! I’m super excited to share something I’ve been working on – ProdAI, my very own open-source AI assistant. If you’ve ever wanted a handy AI buddy to help with your daily tasks, answer questions, or just have a chat, then you’re going to love this. Let me walk you through what ProdAI is, how it works, and how you can set it up for yourself. Available at my Github repository: https://github.
